title: Imaginary Friends
description: 'Imaginary Friends' is a book of engaging and insightful short stories by M D Curzon, the author of 'Anticipation'. 'Imaginary Friends' includes the title story and a dozen others, from the experimental juvenilia of 'Space Stations and Weather Balloons' through to the highly refined 'One Thing in Light of Another'. These diverse stories were written over a number of years but are now available for the first time in anthology form.
author: M.D. Curzon
